707644f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 60th St.
707644f-a.text:
First Ave., east side, south from East 6lst., to and including 6Oth
Streets. Shown in the background, (60th Street), is the ramp and approach
of the Oueensboro Bridge.
June 16, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

707643f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 60th St. E.
707643f-a.text:
First Aoenue, east side, north from E. 60th Street.
At the right is a gasoline station (detailed in view 2)
at the N. E. corner. Above same are the gas holders on
York Avenue.
August 1, 1939
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
IO REPRODUCTIONS

714058f-c.text:
(1)
E.60th Street,north side., and west from First Avenue.
August ist,1939
(2)
E.62nd Street,south east corner., and First Avenue looking

Bridge in background.
.July 19th,1939.
(3)

August 27th,1939.
P.L.Sperr,

714057f-b.title: Manhattan: 60th Street (East) - 1st Avenue
714057f-b.text:
E. 60th Street, at and eaat ofthe N.E. corner of First Avenue.
Shown are old tenements being torn down for new apartment house
development. View 1 shows Nos. 403 to 417 E. 60th Street, where a
new apartment house was later put up, seen on the right in view 2.
View 2 shows No. 401 E. 60th Street (rirht), a corner tenement
and Nos. 1104-1108 First Avenue (left), which are also coming down.

P. L. Sperr  View 1: August 5, 1929
NO REPRODUCTIONS  View 2: Sept. 25, 1935

714059f-a.title: Manhattan: 60th Street (East) - 1st Avenue
714059f-a.text:
3E3-351 East 60th Street, west of and adjoining the N.W.
corner of First Avenue.
October 21, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
